experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed both front-end and back-end components of various websites using Laravel Best Practices to ensure code maintainability and efficiency.
Designed user-friendly interfaces and ensured responsive layouts.
Implemented UI/UX principles to enhance user experiences.
Designed and developed APIs to streamline application integration.
Created a boilerplate for upcoming projects, complete with detailed documentation such as ADRs and usage guidelines.
Showcased projects to clients, presenting features and progress effectively.
Ensured the implementation of efficient algorithms to optimize application performance.
Contributed to the development of 9 applications, collaborating effectively with the team.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Focused on understanding the lifecycle and management of software projects.
Observed and participated in project planning and execution phases.

activities: Student Council, Head of IT Division
Actively involved in various organizations and events as both coordinator and executor
Active participant in competitions and seminars, enhancing skills and knowledge
achievements: Graduated top of my class in Software Engineering, recognized for outstanding academic performance and practical expertise, proven through successful internship programs that accelerated my entry into the industry.
Highest TOEIC Score (2022) - Achieved the highest TOEIC score at SMK Wikrama, demonstrating proficiency in English communication skills.

Second Rank - Bebras Computational Thinking Challenge (City Level, 2023) - Ranked 2nd in the Bebras Computational Thinking Challenge at the city level, showcasing strong problem-solving and logical reasoning abilities.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science - BS, Computer Science
